snippet: The White House is endorsing a bill sponsored in the Senate by Tom Harkin of Iowa and in the House by George Miller of California, both Democrats.
abstract: Pres Obama endorses bill sponsored by Sen Tom Harkin and Rep George Miller that would raise federal minimum wage to at least $10 an hour; legislation would probably be coupled with some tax sweeteners for small businesses, traditionally the loudest opponents of increases to the minimum wage

byline.original: By CATHERINE RAMPELL and STEVEN GREENHOUSE

lead_paragraph: The White House is endorsing a bill sponsored in the Senate by Tom Harkin of Iowa and in the House by George Miller of California, both Democrats.

headline.main: $10 Minimum Wage Proposal Has Growing Support From White House
headline.print_headline: $10 Minimum Wage Proposal Has Growing Support From White House
